io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.workflow

Class GameBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.pgn.api.AbstractParserVisitor
      • io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.workflow.GameBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParserVisitor

    public class GameBuilder
extends AbstractParserVisitor
    A simple game visitor, which can be used to obtain a game from a PGN text stream. The fields retrieved from the game are the ones described in the Game.

      • visitUnstructuredMove

        public void visitUnstructuredMove(java.lang.String value)
        Specified by:
        visitUnstructuredMove in interface ParserVisitor
        Overrides:
        visitUnstructuredMove in class AbstractParserVisitor
        Parameters:
        value - A probable full move, unparsed. Further methods of this interface list components for a move (figurine, column...), as they are recognized by the PGN specification.
        See Also:
        UnstructuredMoveToken
